techmeme.title: Intel unveils a new slogan, "That's the power of Intel Inside", building on its Intel Inside campaign in 1991; its current marketing focuses on the Core series (Anton Shilov/Tom's Hardware)
Sources: Ireland's DPC will fine TikTok €500M+ before the end of April for illegally shipping European users' data to China, after a lengthy GDPR investigation (Samuel Stolton/Bloomberg)
Plaid raised $575M at a $6.1B valuation, below its peak $13B+ valuation in 2021, mostly to cover employees' tax bills for those converting RSUs to common stock (Financial Times)
Sources: Microsoft has halted talks for, or delayed development of, data center projects in Indonesia, the UK, Australia, Illinois, North Dakota, and Wisconsin (Bloomberg)
PDD-owned Pinduoduo says it plans to allocate ~$13B over the next three years to support its merchants, following other Chinese e-commerce companies (Tracy Qu/Wall Street Journal)
